title: Investigate Excavation Damage Incident
description: After a third-party digging crew damaged a gas line, a compliance officer investigates the incident.

tasks.description: Check the 811 one-call system to see if the excavator had a valid ticket to dig at that location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator finds that no one-call ticket was ever created for the job.

tasks.description: Interview the excavation crew and collect documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator documents the details of the incident.

tasks.description: Compile an incident report and submit it to the state regulatory commission, recommending a fine for the excavator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator generates and submits the formal regulatory report.
